abstract: Warren Buffett further reduced his stake in the listed shares of the PetroChina Company to 7.99 percent from 8.21 percent, according to a filing to the Hong Kong stock exchange Friday.
lead_paragraph: Warren Buffett further reduced his stake in the listed shares of the PetroChina Company to 7.99 percent from 8.21 percent, according to a filing to the Hong Kong stock exchange Friday.

headline.main: Warren Buffett Sells More of His PetroChina Stake
